tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE language_resources (
    resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_name VARCHAR(255),
    resource_type VARCHAR(50),
    language VARCHAR(50),
    level_of_proficiency VARCHAR(20),
    is_public BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE study_materials (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    material_type VARCHAR(50),
    language VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    resource_id INT REFERENCES language_resources(id)
);

CREATE TABLE LanguageResources (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_name VARCHAR(255),
    resource_type VARCHAR(50),
    language VARCHAR(50),
    resource_link TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE StudyMaterials (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(255),
    material_type VARCHAR(50),
    language VARCHAR(50),
    material_link TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE users(
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_name VARCHAR(100),
  user_email VARCHAR(100),
  subscribed_language_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (subscribed_language_id) REFERENCES languages(language_id)
);
